songs.full_title: In My Car by Ringo Starr
songs.title: In My Car
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Doesn't make a difference
Don't care how far
We can go the distance in my car
Don't bother with directions
Doesn't matter where we are
Cruising down the highway in my car

[Chorus]
Hey!
In my car

[Verse 2]

I don't need no back seat drivers
So i leave them all behind
And problems, they can't find me in my car
In my car

[Chorus]
Hey!
In my car

[Outro]
(in my car) [x3]
(my car)

songs.title: Hopeless
songs.lyrics:
[Verse]
When I woke up this morning
Much to my surprise
The sun was going down
And I was still alive
I looked into the mirror
And according to my eyes
The martians have invaded
It's hopeless

I went to see my doctor
To ask him what to do
Depending on the diagnosis
I said, "doc, I'm seeing double
And how are both of you?
No cause for alarm, it's hopeless

You don't stand a chance, it's hopeless
Everybody dance!

Well, there's paradise and doomsday
It depends on which comes first
There's inner peace through meditation
There's optimists and pessimists
I don't know which is worse
But the yogi mow mow, but the yogi mow mow
It's hopeless

The solution has been dissolved
The crisis has been resolved
There's no need to change your plans
It's a hopeless situation

For tomorrow is another day
And everything will be okay
And by the way, it's hopeless
(hopeless)

songs.title: Alibi
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
You came into my life
When I was looking for an alibi
You looked in my eyes
And I could tell you no lie
I was making life, feel all right
But it wasn't good
Looking at you, looking at me
I knew you understood
I've been down for so long
Looking for a good disguise
Feeling sorry for myself
I didn't realize
That I was digging holes
Acting roles
With no lines to say
I was losing sleep, counting sheep
That never went away

[Chorus]
I was waiting for you to come into my life
Making up stories or looking for an alibi

[Verse 2]
Now we're together
It's going to be never
We'll be parted again
I've loved you since the day we met
And that was way back when
I was making life, feel all right
In the same old way. (same old way)
I'm digging holes
Acting roles
With no lines to say

[Chorus]
I was waiting for you to come into my life
Making up stories, looking for an alibi
Looking for an alibi

[Outro]
Oh, looking for an alibi
Oh, making those alibis
Oh, looking for an alibi

songs.full_title: Be My Baby by Ringo Starr
songs.title: Be My Baby
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Hormone in production
Such a waste of time
Let's get down to business
I know I'm a stranger
You should know that I'm
Won't you be my baby?
Good girls should be careful
And always home on time
(good girls should be careful)
Don't misunderstand me
You can make the rules
But i'll make the arrangements

[Chorus]
All you got to do is be my baby
Be my baby

[Verse 2]
Help you with your problems
You help me with mine
Won't you be my baby?
I can teach you things
You'll never learn in school
You don't have to thank me

[Chorus]
All you got to do is be my baby
Be my baby, that's all you got to do
You'll take care of me, babe
And I'll take care of you
Won't you be my baby?

[Bridge]
(be my baby) [x5]

[Outro]
(baby, baby, baby, be my baby)
Babe, babe, babe, baby, babe
Come on, baby, come on, baby, now
Oh, baby, baby, (baby, baby) baby, baby
Be my baby, oh, be my baby
I said, babe, babe, babe, baby, babe
"turn the tape off just for me!"

songs.full_title: She's About A Mover by Ringo Starr
songs.title: She’s About A Mover
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Well, she was walking down the street
Looking fine as she could be, hey, hey
Well, she was walking down that street
Looking fine as she can be
Well, you know i love you, baby
Woah, yeah, what I'd say

[Chorus]
(she's about a mover) [x4]
Hey, hey, hey, hey, what I'd say
(she's about a mover) [x2]
Well, you know I love you, baby
Woah, yeah, what I'd say, hey, hey

[Verse 2]
She strolled on up to me
Said, "hey, big boy, what's your name?" Hey, hey
Well, she strolled on up to me
She said, "hey, big boy, what's your name?"
If you want love and conversation
Woah, yeah, what I'd say

[Chorus]
(she's about a mover) [x4]
Hey, hey, hey, hey, what I'd say
(she's about a mover) [x2]
If you want love and conversation
Woah, yeah, what I'd say, hey, hey
Well, you know I love you, baby
Woah, yeah, what I'd say, hey, hey
Come on, do it to me, baby!
Yeah!

songs.full_title: I Keep Forgettin' by Ringo Starr
songs.title: I Keep Forgettin’
songs.lyrics:
[Chorus]
I keep forgetting you don't love me no more
I keep forgetting you don't want me no more
I keep forgetting that you told me that you
Didn't want me around any more

[Verse 1]
But these stupid old feet
Just head for your street
Like they've done so many times before
And this stubborn old fist
On the end of my wrist
Starts knocking on your front door

[Chorus]
I keep forgetting you don't love me no more
I keep forgetting you don't want me no more
I keep forgetting about those heartbreaking nights
And those heartbreaking things that you said - ooh

[Verse 2]
Though I know in my heart
We've drifted apart
Still i can't believe our love is dead
Though it's plain as can be
That you're finished with me
I just can't get it through my head

[Bridge]
I keep forgetting you don't love me no more, (you don't love me no more)
Don't love me no more, (love me no more)
I keep forgetting you don't love me no more

[Chorus]
I keep forgetting you don't love me no more
I keep forgetting you don't want me no more
I keep forgetting about those heartbreaking nights
And those heartbreaking things that you said - ooh

[Repeat Verse 2]

[Outro]
I keep forgetting you don't love me no more, (no, don't love me no more)
Don't love me no more, (oh, you don't love me no more)
I keep forgetting you don't love me no more. (yo!)

songs.full_title: Picture Show Life by Ringo Starr
songs.title: Picture Show Life
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Hollywood is waltzing
Doing that double talking
Anything they could do
To make it through another L.A. night

[Chorus]
And can you imagine
All those girls are strolling
All the boys are holding
They're doing their best to
Make it through another L.A. night
In a picture show life

[Verse 2]
In their own little world
In their own little space
They can be who they want to
In their own little place
Hollywood is reeling
With the double meaning
Anything they could say to
Make it through another L.A. night

[Chorus]
And can you imagine
All the girls are smiling
All the boys are trying
Anything they can take to
Burn away another L.A. night
In a picture show life

[Verse 3]
They win and they lose
And they pick and they choose
They've been dancing for so long
What else can they do?
Hollywood is rocking
Doing the double talking
Anything they can do
To make it through another L.A. night

[Chorus]
And can you imagine
All those girls are strolling
All those boys are holding
They're doing their best to
Make it through another L.A. night
In a picture show life

[Outro]
In their own little world
In their own little space
They can be who they want to
In their own little place
They can be who they want to
In their own little place
They can be who they want to

songs.full_title: As Far As We Can Go by Ringo Starr
songs.title: As Far As We Can Go
songs.title_with_featured: As Far As We Can Go
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
You don't have to say, I see it on your face
When tears fall
They leave a trace
I told myself it won't be long
It's too bad
To lose what we had

[Pre-Chorus]
I thought our love song would go on and on

[Chorus]
People talk, yes, I think they know
I guess that it must show
We've gone as far as we can go
They walk by and they whisper low
The rumors had to flow
We've gone as far as we can go

[Pre-Chorus]

[Chorus]

songs.full_title: Everybody's In A Hurry But Me by Ringo Starr
songs.title: Everybody’s In A Hurry But Me
songs.title_with_featured: Everybody's In A Hurry But Me

songs.title: Going Down
songs.lyrics:
[Verse]
I'm going down [x3]
I'm coming up [x3]
I'm moving on (moving on) [x2]
(well, we're moving on) moving on
